message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I understand you wanting a bit more, but I need a fairer share too. This offer is better for both of us in the long run.
I'll compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Time is running out, and we both lose if we don't agree.  I'm willing to meet in the middle with this offer.  Let's be reasonable and close this deal.
I see you're getting desperate, but I'm still not willing to meet in the middle. This is my best offer yet.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing out because of your greed.  I'm offering a perfectly fair 50/50 split. Take it or leave it, but I won't accept anything less.
